name: BULLET PARTY
detailed_description:
The party co-op shoot ’em up!

Become the king of the night club alone or group your friends and shoot the party crashers down !

Will you let them ruin your fun?

Features
  • 180 levels!
  • Co-pilot mode: dead players become ghosts to help their living friends!
  • Auto adjust of speed, so the game will get fast if you are doing great or slow down if you need more practice!
  • Ultra bomb: when two bombs collide, they become a super sized bomb that will freeze all enemies!
  • Puzzles and speed challenges: sometimes you have to use your brains, other times your agility!
  • King's Crown: compete against your friends to see who is the Most Valuable Player!

Warning: This game is so flashy that it might kill photosensitive people and those with a weak heart!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
